text: Atahpara tomara nikata satya sambada ese ya'oyara para yadi e'i kahini samparke tomara sathe ke'u bibada kare, tahale bala-eso, amara deke ne'i amadera putradera ebam tomadera putradera ebam amadera stridera o tomadera stridera ebam amadera nijedera o tomadera nijedera ara tarapara cala amara saba'i mile prarthana kari ebam tadera prati allahara abhisampata kari yara mithyabadi.
